website_summaries.verdict: A reliable serum that contains a very high concentration of vitamin C for a surprisingly low price. But it may be too strong for users unaccustomed to vitamin C.
pros: Contains 23% vitamin C. Reduces the appearance of stubborn dark spots
Affordable, plus you don't need a lot to see results over time
Using a small amount until your skin adjusts will help minimize the burning sensation
cons: Not ideal for first-time users of vitamin C. A tricky serum to use

customer_reviews.title: Dramatically Increased Acne Instead of Eliminating
customer_reviews.text: This product made my face completely erupt in small acne bumps. Though I thought the burning was as expected, it let to me making up in the morning with my face red and bumping. I am extremely disappointed that this has happened.
customer_reviews.author: zaynab

customer_reviews.title: Work with it a bit until you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit of getting used to with the grainy texture which is also a bit runny. First couple of times I squeezed out way too much. A little will actually go a long way. I believe it has made a difference in the brightness of my skin and the sun damage. Can’t beat the price and it is super moisturizing. I use it at night after cleansing as it is a bit grainy and heavy to wear under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: P. James

customer_reviews.title: It's good, feels wierd though!
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving what it's doing FOR my skin. I just don't care for the way that it feels ON my skin. I read several reviews and watched about 5 YouTube tutorials so I felt prepared. I wasn't as prepared as I hoped. Don't get me wrong, I believe it to be a good product and from my understanding it's "grittiness" lends to it's potency. Just don't expect to smooth this on as you would a serum. 😏
customer_reviews.author: Qmnauni3

customer_reviews.title: The only think I don't like about it is that it feels VERY occlusive
customer_reviews.text: They are packaged well: both lightfast and suspended in something other than water for maximum effectiveness. The only think I don't like about it is that it feels VERY occlusive. There's no way that I could use this in the morning, because it feels like the carrier material doesn't soak into the skin. I know a lot of people love this Vitamin C product for the price, but I was unhappy about how thick it was. (That said, the Vitamin C felt very effective: it gave you the tingle on your skin that you want.) I wouldn't purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Zettl

customer_reviews.title: skip this for a real moisturizer, there are so many great ones out here!
customer_reviews.text: this is a popular and cheap brand of skin products. this vitamin “suspension” is gritty and sticky all at once! it does not settle in to skin so you’ll be wiping it off in minutes. try their 10 min red AHA mask it’s their best product. I buy my own things and only review things to share good or bad impressions with another shopper digging through the same choices! so no I was not given anything to review-i paid I cried now you don’t have to! the company nearly went under so buying it here on amazon makes perfect sense!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Sean Fishman

customer_reviews.title: Burns but works great
customer_reviews.text: The first night I put this on it stung and burned my face I woke up with a big patch of blood that came from what looked like major scratches on my face, kind of scary but the scab went away and the rest of my face looked smooth. I've used for 2 weeks it works really good but hard to sleep cause it really does itch and hurt my face and goes on very very thick no way you can use this during the daytime.
customer_reviews.author: America F.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down THE BEST Vitamin C product on the market. It's formulated at the perfect pH and you can literally feel it tingle and burn as the little beads of L-ascorbic acid dissolve into your skin. And then - on top of it being super potent and efficacious Vitamin C - Hyaluronic Acid is added to the formula, to boot! I love the Ordinary. Something this potent and effective could literally go for over $70. Most companies would charge at least that for this product. But that's not the way the Ordinary rolls! They keep everything fair and affordable. Out of all the different Vitamin C products they offer, this one is my personal favorite.
customer_reviews.author: AmberTal3

customer_reviews.title: Love this Vitamin C
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this product multiple times. This is my Vit C of choice. Yes it a bit gritty, but once you find the correct application method that works for you, you will not be sorry. It has reduced the scarring that acne left on my face dramatically and leaves my skin with a beautiful glow.
customer_reviews.author: divasemmmons

customer_reviews.title: A Gritty Disaster
customer_reviews.text: I thought I had found something special. You were so smooth. In the morning I glowed. But now it's different. You've changed. You burn me. In the morning I'm red and blotchy. I feel gritty and filled with regret. Now I know it was just a lie.
customer_reviews.author: hkudra

customer_reviews.title: Really evened out my skin tone (vitamin C in this concentration normally cost $50-60)
customer_reviews.text: I Love all the ordinary products, I put this on after I wash my face and tone my face then layer this with my sunscreen, this product has really helped the overall appearance of my skin. I have noticed my skin tone looks much more even! I will say if you have a zit, sometimes it burns for like a second but goes away quickly. it's a pretty high concentration of vitamin C (normally cost upwards of $50-60 regularly) such a good value I would highly recommend all The Ordinary products!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok to me. It’s very funny and does leave my face oily. My face isn’t as oily normally so it’s a little annoying. I don’t wear makeup so I can’t cover it. I’ve stopped using it which is annoying because I feel like I wasted my money. I will try it again soon and hopefully like it. I didn’t feel a terrible tingle or burn like others. I felt it very lightly on my 5th day using it but nothing else. It also is tough to use with the bottle it comes in as the hole it’s dispensed through is big and the product just comes out and gets wasted
customer_reviews.author: natak

customer_reviews.title: Very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger than I expected. Stings. Also greasy application. I’d prefer a lighter, quick drying application.
customer_reviews.author: MG213

customer_reviews.title: The Ordinary makes some of my favorite skin care products ever
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to do your research, as these products are a little different than a lot of skin care on the market. But they are priced so well and make a huge difference when applied correctly. The Ordinary website does a great job of explaining what products interact well and what you should use for certain concerns. Check that out to make sure you’re using the product as intended. This vitamin c suspension, specifically, really held brighten and improve the texture of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Esthetician approved
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the price AND I can tell it's very potent. Good stuff. Soooooo glad I discovered The Ordinary. I tell all my clients about them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Not Sealed, Watered Down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because they were out of stock on the company website. It was more expensive than ordering it from the company, but I was out, so I paid the extra. However, the product did not come sealed as the products direct from the company do. It was also very runny. More watered-down than it usually is. Would NOT recommend. They’re charging more money for a less-quality, possibly tampered-with product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gritty and stings.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. It stings like crazy and I could not get past the texture. It is gritty and does not sink into the skin. It is super strong and I would not recommend it for a beginner that has not tried vitamin C. I love the ordinary other products but this one is not thought out well.
customer_reviews.author: Nerdcamel books

customer_reviews.title: I love using vitamin C in my skin care routine, but this stuff hurts!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I really wanted to be a fan of this because I love using vitamin C in my skin care routine, but this stuff hurts! I don’t have particularly sensitive skin, so I don’t know why my skin hates this stuff so much, but the stinging/itching/burning sensation is just too much. I’ve tried combining it with other face products (serums, moisturizers, acne treatments) but nothing helps. It stings for about 15 minutes after I put it on. Honestly haven’t really even noticed a difference in my skin either.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. 60% of the package is full of air
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, but the package is full of air. Therefore, you end up paying a little amount for a very little quantity. No so abnormal after all. In the pictures you can see the brand new product before and after you remove all the air.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Too Greasy for my skin
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if I got a fake product, but mine was not gritty at all as most reviews stated. Nor did it burn my face. It did however make me break out from being so greasy, so I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra McLean

customer_reviews.title: Takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is very gritty and can ball up, but the trick I used was applying a watery non-acid/alcohol toner with my hands and massaging gently into the skin. It seems to break down the vit c spheres better and while the product doesn't fully absorb into the skin (leaves a slight oily finish), it's a great addition to your night time regimen. Very strong, might tingle or burn but that's expected in products with high level of vit c.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: WOW.....this is most effective and you will feel the stinging on your face. I love it...........but I get ready with a fan before I apply
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gritty Consistency
customer_reviews.text: Very gritty and grainy. The Vitamin C doesn't not seemed blended properly into this lotion. I have made my own and I know how this can be. Therefore, I find it can only be used apart from anything else - for certain not under makeup. I WISH it was more emollient and not gritty, perhaps I just got a bad batch. Can't really recommend it as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Hut Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't be shipped in very hot weather
customer_reviews.text: I met the delivery person on my front porch so it did not sit out in the heat (92 degrees) I removed the tube from the box and the product began leaking onto my hand, even before the seal had been taken off the tube. It was (is) like water. This is a great product that I have used before but the heat just disintegrated it. It shouldn't be shipped top hot climates (south coast of Georgia).
customer_reviews.author: Unanimous

customer_reviews.title: I love The Ordinary
customer_reviews.text: The Vitamin C is great because it is in squalane so pH not an issue. Can burn a bit the first time but I love the way my skin is looking
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I’ve tried from the ordinary and I have to say I absolutely love it!!! I have oily skin and it’s not greasy at all. It is a little gritty upon application but that dissipates after about 30 seconds of being on the skin. It does not at all affect the way my foundation looks over it so I wear this every day. This product is so wonderful that I’m now going to start incorporating different ordinary products into my skin care routine
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if acne-prone
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could get over 'the purge' phase of this because I wanted a strong vitamin C for anti-aging and texture irregularities. But even after 2 months of regular use my skin breaks out every time I try it. I do have acne-prone skin and it just looks bad every single time. I still LOVE The Ordinary products Be careful, I just need to find a different Vit C.
customer_reviews.author: KeliBaby

customer_reviews.title: It works but it’s too
customer_reviews.text: I like this product however it burns, I mean really really burns. Even mixed in with other creams and serums. I have sensitive skin so it wasn’t surprising really. My skin under my eye has turned red with irritation.
customer_reviews.author: B. J

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this I was surprised by the gritty texture. I read others comments and learned its supposed to be that way. Only use a small amount. The grit melts into your skin and gently exfoliates. I will buy this again. I see and feel a difference after only 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is my first product from The Ordinary. I haven't really felt the grittiness that people are mentioning. The product goes on smoothly and I look forward to seeing what it actually does for my 62 year old skin - if anything.
customer_reviews.author: SherylB

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin C is the boss.
customer_reviews.text: Works extremely well. I will say I purged really badly for the first 2 times I used it (spread out over a week) but now it's smooth sailing. Sting a bit when you put it on, but you wake up to super smooth and even-toned skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients .
customer_reviews.text: I liked it , it’s gritty but that’s what a suspension is so lol duh ! But I don’t feel like it gave me any results really... I used the whole bottle but I would repurchase because I do love having an affordable great ingredient vitamin c in my regimen
customer_reviews.author: Brooklin

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for this product. It goes on gritty, has an odd smell, and makes me feel like I need to wash my face immediately after applying. In addition, it "curdles" when used with some of their other products despite reviewing their website for the best way to layer products. Just, no thanks
customer_reviews.author: Netties

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I love this product...you can feel it working and a few days later you can see and feel the results. WARNING - it does offer a tingling feeling like itchy, burning. It never burned my skin but it is mildly irritating. That being said, is why it works! I have had little bumps and small moles removed by this product! Love it and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Conaway

customer_reviews.title: Grainy, good price
customer_reviews.text: I’m used to using Obaji products.. this definitely isn’t. Very grainy.. can’t tell if it’s working- used whole bottle- can’t really tell the difference. Good price- Bought it off of suggestions from dermatologists on Tik Tok.. pretty sure they were getting paid to promote this. They most likely use the higher end stuff. Will go back to Obaji.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Rayburn

customer_reviews.title: Great results and price.
customer_reviews.text: Brighten the skin and some fading of brown spots. Noticeable improvement. I only use it at night because it caused ‘pilling’ with my foundation. The first couple of times you use it it stings, so just a dab when you first start. This is a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M.

customer_reviews.title: Turned my hands orange!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to long terms effects because I couldn’t use it that long. After 3 uses, I noticed acne beginning and it turned my hands orange. It’s greasy and doesn’t lay under product well. I normally love Ordinary products but this one was a no go for me :(
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I put this product on, it turns my skin red and splotchy. It’s not necessarily irritated (it doesn’t sting or itch), but it is unsightly and my other products do not go on as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: grainy but works
customer_reviews.text: I found that this product has an off smell, and feels a bit greasy on my face. I have very dry, acne prone, sensitive skin and i never had any issues except for the smell. also, be warned the texture is somewhat grainy.
customer_reviews.author: CeCe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing serum! You can feel a tingling sensation but nothing too strong. Leaves you glowing, a little goes a long way. I would recommend mixing it with your face lotion to dilute it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Lozoya

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: My laser skin place recommended this product to me. It's expensive for the size . However, I hope it works. Reviews are great. So, I shall see.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie H.

customer_reviews.title: Caused me to Break Out
customer_reviews.text: Had to stop using because it was breaking my face out.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: My face feels so different (in an amazing way) after using this. It’s softer, clearer, and just amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Coakley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Love, love , love this stuff. I have tried skincare lines from drugstore up to high end department store brands and never felt I saw results until now. I’ve ordered several items including foundation and am amazed by every single one!
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin c at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Love this vitamin C! Works well and a great price. I’ve been using this for awhile now and it does what it says. Little tingly or prickly like when you first start to use it or start using slowly not to every day but does help brighten your complexion and fade stubborn scars. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bouck

customer_reviews.title: Same products; different textures
customer_reviews.text: I was a fan of this product but my mom ordered the exact same product (also from Amazon) and the textures are completely different. Mine is grainy and almost exfoliating. I’m confused and a little skeptical. Overall though I use it overnight and my skin looks great the next day. But quality control seems to be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Feels like silk
customer_reviews.text: I know people say the texture is gritty, but vitamin c in its purest form is gritty. Add a tiny bit of your own moisturizing lotion and it goes smooths our like silk
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I love this; it is the only bit C serum/lotion I have used that produces noticeable results quickly. Deducting a star due to the fact that the formulation has a nasty preservative.
customer_reviews.author: J. Henry

customer_reviews.title: Full tube??
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I received a full tube of this product. The tube didn’t feel full. It constantly leaked out of the cap, making a mess, unless I leaned it upside down against something. Not real impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia  Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product and how my skin looks. The small spheres were a little hard to get used to as most HA products that I have used are smooth in texture. It does absorb quickly though and works well under other moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very irritating and questionable results
customer_reviews.text: Caused immediate burning and irritation, maybe that’s the goal but wasn’t for me! I tried using a tiny amount to acclimate but just decided it was working for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieB_Well

customer_reviews.title: Tingles a bit, but that's ok
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It tingles a bit, but I got used to it. I recommend this Vitamin C cream
customer_reviews.author: Roger da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Best product ever!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 41 year old male. I’ve used products from many countries around the world, including really expensive products. This is by far the best products that I have ever used. I’ve been using this now for the past month and the results have been incredible. I have far fewer lines, clearer skin and a natural dewy glow. I love this so much.
customer_reviews.author: Deon Benito

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper at Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product but it’s only 5.80 at Sephora so I’ll be buying it from Sephora next time
customer_reviews.author: The ladies

customer_reviews.title: A little greasy
customer_reviews.text: I think it probably works ok, but the greasiness I am not a fan of. I use it occasionally but not that often anymore
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Gritty but firms
customer_reviews.text: Slight tingly sensation when used but firms the skin and helps breakup discoloration. A bit of a gritty finish so applying a moisturize after helps. This does not moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Fran54

customer_reviews.title: Not like my first bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bottle. First one I liked a lot so I obviously ordered again. This second bottle looks slightly older than first one and packing is a touch different than my first bottle. This feels like it has sand or fiberglass in it??
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Don't go there.
customer_reviews.text: Wow. It creates a shine on your face you can barely wash off. But it's cheap. Course, its unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Jlwleighton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I read reviews about the tingling but know from making my own vitamin c serum that its supposed tingle. That’s honestly how I know this has a good amount of vitamin c and is working!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love the ordinary products, they live up to their hype.
customer_reviews.author: Clairebear

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have exzcema and psoriasis on my face and originally i didn’t feel this product was helping, but after 1-2 weeks I noticed a difference! my skin was so much more glowy and fresh looking! will likely use this product forever
customer_reviews.author: Shannon geenen

customer_reviews.title: It burned my skin too much
customer_reviews.text: Holy hell did this stuff burn...I tried layering but because of the texture I had problems. This stuff may be good for others but it just made my skin really angry...like most skincare I suppose YMMV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: It caused tingling and made my face go red. Can’t be used with Niacinamide and zinc of The ordinary. Is very shiny on face and doesn’t get absorbed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ridhika

customer_reviews.title: Great product fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product!! My mom loves it too. I usually get in on The Ordinary website but got it here this time because of the delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Majo Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing treatment
customer_reviews.text: This is game changing. It will really smooth and even out your skin. I dermal roll and follow with this and hylauronic acid and it’s changing my skin. Def five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gina G

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing, especially for the price. Yes. You will feel tingling. THAT MEANS ITS WORKING. My pigmentation has lightened and my skin is uber smooth. Customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful skin without dark spots
customer_reviews.text: This product is really great, it helped me to remove stains from my skin, I remove the dark spots that I had from acne, also the spots from the sun, I am very happy with how my skin changed, the change is seen in just a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lucía

customer_reviews.title: Works really works.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I used one tube and was getting low. So I quickly ordered 2 this last time.
customer_reviews.author: 💞💓BougieonaBudget💞💓

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that this product is nourishing and quenches my dry skin from the cold weather. The only thing I don’t like is that I notice throughout the day, it makes my skin like an oil slick, and I need to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Is a great product for an amazing price. Love the brand
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Great skincare product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. It works well - my skin looks brighter after I apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Do not get, must be knock off
customer_reviews.text: Oily, had chunks of beads in it that didn’t dissolve
customer_reviews.author: Janesa

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: i really love this product! Makes my skin soft and moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Gana23

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I saw a difference in my dark spots after ONE USE! There has been a significant difference after only 5 days of using this. Product is a little oily and grainy when applied but it doesn’t even bother me because of how well it works. Definitely worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ward

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing product for such a great price. Was gifted my first 2!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this product. Super affordable and leaves your face bright and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Barberio

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Closed Comedones appear on my face a day afterwards.It might actually be a allergic reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Jonah

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: My sensitive skin didn't like this product.. that is the only reason for the 3 stars. But the packaging and price is great and worth a try if your skin is hardier.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Kelly Cormier

customer_reviews.title: Balls
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'll grow some. Lol can't get over the tingling. It now collects dust, at least it was cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! I started seeing improvements in the very first week! Yes it does tingle/ sting some for a few seconds. I find that if you mix it with a moisturizer it doesnt tingle as much. For the price and results im seeing thus far, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: vitamin c
customer_reviews.text: orange you glad I didn't say banana? I use this vitamin c on my face every night and I glow in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not a fan of the texture
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a bit, but didn't really like the gritty/kind of oily texture mentioned in other reviews - I think I personally prefer other vitamin C serums I've tried, but this is definitely a relatively cheap option if it works for you!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian Jiang

customer_reviews.title: First time trying The Ordinary - LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using the Vitamin C Suspension for a few days but I really like it! I've already seen a positive effect from it. It does have a tingly sensation when applied but it doesn't bother me or my skin at all. I can't wait to try more products from The Ordinary.
customer_reviews.author: English

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product at a great price. Skin feels smooth and looks clear. Check The Ordinary website to make sure you are getting product at the lowest price.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product is simple but effective. It wasn’t tingly but I did experience a burning as you would with most acid products but there was no peeling.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Mendy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Yes it tingles a bit. Effective product to smooth skin texture. The best I’ve found so far
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite Vitamin C skin supplement ever. I’m 62 and I can actually see a difference when I use it. It is a bit grainy, but absorbs in a few minutes. Great products with reasonable prices from this company! Love “The Ordinary!”
customer_reviews.author: S. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Over-rated product- DON’T buy
customer_reviews.text: I did not like anything about this product. I have used other brands of Vitamin C with better experience. This one did nothing for my skin, rather it made it worse.
customer_reviews.author: Amy N

customer_reviews.title: This burned the minute I put it on.
customer_reviews.text: This started burning immediately after I put a very thin layer on my face. The kicker is, I can't return it so I'm stuck with a product I can't use. Read the fine print folks and make sure you order something you have used before and know there's not a problem with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Top vitamin c. I dilute mine w lotion bc it’s very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your collection.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Very hydrating. I used it before bed. I saw a difference immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on Sephora
customer_reviews.text: Have only recently started using it and love it so far. It feels silky going on and stings a little bit it says it’s supposed to. It’s cheaper on Sephora
customer_reviews.author: Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Saw no results
customer_reviews.text: I saw more results from a Vitamin C oil from the beauty supply store than this product. Maybe it's my skin but it was a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Least Liked Ordinary product thus far.
customer_reviews.text: So it's mentioned on the directions that this might cause a 'little irritation/ mild burning" but, maaan, does this stuff kill my face right before bed time. I've combined with some acne treatment as well as The Ordinary Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution, and have since, seen little/ no difference in the hydration of my face when removing this specifically from my skin care regimen. Also note: I have dry/ combo/ sensitive skin. So? If you've the same skin as me, I'd recommend deleting it before checkout... Or, buy it for curiosity and see if it's a better fit for you.
customer_reviews.author: rs

customer_reviews.title: I like this better than vitamin c oil/serum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than a week ago and I already want to have more of it. I wish it came in a bigger sized tube so it could last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great results for the money.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a moisturizing product so it didn’t get a star.
customer_reviews.author: tealeighves

customer_reviews.title: After just a week, I feel like it’s working
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to say if I see any visible affect yet, but it feels like it is doing something, which is half the battle. For those with sensitive skin, it does have an exfoliating texture that may be too rough for you.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: But I stopped using it Bc it burns and stings like cray!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it works or not. But I stopped using it Bc it burns and stings like cray!!!
customer_reviews.author: Addie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is gritty and it does pil if layered too quickly but knowing that I'm ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Did not like!!! The skin does not absorb the product and crumble it all.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamin c serum
customer_reviews.text: Nice vitamin c serum for night use since it is a bit heavy and oily. Leaves skin looking dewy.
customer_reviews.author: ramiro
